translations: n.荷兰球形干酪（黄色，用红蜡包包装）

phrs.translation: 埃德姆芝士, 埃丹, 艾登, 荷兰的艾顿
爱达姆干酪, 红波芝士, 红波奶酪, 艾登奶酪
宝盾旋转门, 荷兰皇家宝盾, 宝盾扭转门
荷兰球形干酪国会图片

sentences.sentence: Edam: a town of western Netherlands on the Ijsselmeer. Chartered in 1357, it has a famous cheese market.
sentences.translation: 伊丹：荷兰西部一城镇，位于爱塞美尔湖畔。1357年获准建市，拥有著名的奶酪市场。

sentences.sentence: Transmission electron microscopy (TEM) and energy-dispersive analysis microscope (EDAM) examination revealed that there were many granules with high content of cadmium around the cell wall.
sentences.translation: 透射电镜(TEM)和能谱分析(EDAM)表明，细胞壁周围形成大量细小的高镉含量沉淀物。
